1.name: G-12 High Explosive
1.desc: A high explosive grenade which damages lightly armored targets. Creates high damage over a small area when detonated.

2823164517.name: G-16 Impact
2823164517.desc: A high explosive grenade which detonates on first impact.

2877510587.name: G-3 Smoke
2877510587.desc: A 'compliance weapon' to modify enemy behaviour. Creates a thick smoke screen to block targets' line of sight

3295898003.name: G-6 Frag
3295898003.desc: An antipersonnel fragmentation grenade. Creates damage over a large area when detonated.
